Screenwriter: Tai-lee Chan, Lai-yin Leung, Edmond Wong
Production Co: Golden Harvest Company, Starbright Communications, Henan Film & TV Production Group Henan Film Studio, Pegasus Motion Pictures, Dreams Salon Entertainment Culture, Super Hero Films
Synopsis: Martial-arts master Ip Man (Donnie Yen) takes on a crooked developer (Mike Tyson) and his gang of brutal thugs.
Title: Ip Man 3
